spec_data.Name: perl-Data-Validate-Type
spec_data.Description:
This module presents an alternative API to Params::Util which fixes a number
of drawbacks (function names start with an underscore, are uppercase and don't
pass PerlCritic validation).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:39:45 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Public interface to Params::Util offering data type validation functions
